phrs.translation: 预示, 预想, 设想, 预兆

sentences.sentence: These early paintings clearly prefigure his Later work .
sentences.translation: 这些早期绘画清楚的显现出他后期作品的精神。

sentences.sentence: Each of these figures, in many ways, prefigure the relatively superior natures of those who come later in the dialogue.
sentences.translation: 这些角色中的每一位多少，都预示了优于，随后出现在对话中角色的本性。

sentences.sentence: There are also letters on the spine of each book; these letters do not indicate or prefigure what the pages will say.
sentences.translation: 也有在每本书脊椎的信件；这些信件不表明或不预示什么页将说。
